TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AudioSessionCategory extends System.Enum

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioSessionCategory AmbientSound = int32(1634558569)

Docs.summary: Use this category if playing audio is not your application's main use and if your application can be used with the sound off. This allows background music to be mixed with the audio your application produces.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioSessionCategory AudioProcessing = int32(1886547811)

Docs.summary: Use this category when you want to use the hardware accelerated audio support to perform audio conversions.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioSessionCategory MediaPlayback = int32(1835361385)

Docs.summary: Use this if the main use of your application is to play back music.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioSessionCategory PlayAndRecord = int32(1886151026)

Docs.summary: Used to perform both playback and recording at the same time, for example for live chat applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioSessionCategory RecordAudio = int32(1919247201)

Docs.summary: Used to record audio. This will prevent background audio and messages from playing back.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype AudioToolbox.AudioSessionCategory SoloAmbientSound = int32(1936682095)

Docs.summary: This is the default audio session category.
